title: Rubies Ghost Tutu Dress Costume
features: Ghost tutu-style dress with matching headpiece
Dress has attached tutu with accessories
Best fit for children 2 to 3 years old, up to 32 Inch tall
Look to Rubie's for coordinating accessories, make-up, wigs and dress-up fun for the whole family
description: Whether you are looking for dress-up fun or that very special Halloween costume, you've reached the right place. Since 1951 Rubie's has been the world's leader in costumes, decor and accessories - everything you need to make celebrating safe and fun! From witches and pirates to vampires and zombies, from Graceland to galaxies far, far away the Rubie's Costume Collection will inspire you to a bigger and better Halloween season! Mascots, rental quality costumes, masks, wigs, accessories, shoes and every significant licensed costume you want to wear can be found under the Rubie's brand. Still family owned, still family focused; Rubie's brings you fun for every season, Halloween, Christmas, Mardi Gras, Easter and all in-between.
